name: growth-mulch
effect: Used on a patch of soil : Plantâ€™s growth stages will each last 25% less time. Dries soil out more quickly.
short_effect: Growing time of berries is reduced, but the soil dries out faster.

flavor_text.black_white: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
